name: Peela the Potato
description:
It’s the great sale!

Every food in the store is excited to be brought to someone’s home, but there is one little potato that will not allow anybody to take her away!

Meet Peela!

Help Peela escape the many dangers of the great sale! Score as many points as you can by avoiding the peelers standing in Peela's way and get as far as possible!

Avoid every edge of sharp potato peelers and dodge the fast potato beetles that are about to take a bite out of Peela.

How to play:
Windows - use space button to jump.
Android - tap the screen to jump.

The game is free! If you desire, it is possible to donate, but it is not required.
Thank you for downloading my game! I hope you enjoy it and if you do, consider leaving feedback.
